verses.verse: And when the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H954>delayed<s%> to come <S%H3381>down<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> gathered themselves <S%H6950>together<s%> <S%H5921>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him, <S%H6965>Up,<s%> <S%H6213>make<s%> us <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us; <S%H3588>for<s%> as for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> we <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H1961>become<s%> of him.

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, Break <S%H6561>off<s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earrings,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> are in the <S%H241>ears<s%> of your <S%H802>wives,<s%> of your <S%H1121>sons,<s%> and of your <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> and <S%H935>bring<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> me.

And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> broke <S%H6561>off<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H2091>golden<s%> <S%H5141>earrings<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were in their <S%H241>ears,<s%> and <S%H935>brought<s%> them <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>received<s%> them at their <S%H4480>hand,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H6696>fashioned<s%> it with a graving <S%H2747>tool,<s%> after he had <S%H6213>made<s%> it a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf:<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> be thy <S%H430>gods,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> brought thee <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And when <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> it, he <S%H1129>built<s%> an <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> it; and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> made <S%H7121>proclamation,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4279>Tomorrow<s%> is a <S%H2282>feast<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>

And they rose up <S%H7925>early<s%> on the <S%H4480>morrow,<s%> <S%H4283><s%> and <S%H5927>offered<s%> burnt <S%H5930>offerings,<s%> and <S%H5066>brought<s%> peace <S%H8002>offerings;<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> sat <S%H3427>down<s%> to <S%H398>eat<s%> and to <S%H8354>drink,<s%> and rose <S%H6965>up<s%> to <S%H6711>play.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H1980>Go,<s%> get thee <S%H3381>down;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou <S%H5927>broughtest<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> have <S%H7843>corrupted<s%> themselves:

They have turned <S%H5493>aside<s%> <S%H4118>quickly<s%> out <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6680>commanded<s%> them: they have <S%H6213>made<s%> them a <S%H4541>molten<s%> <S%H5695>calf,<s%> and have <S%H7812>worshiped<s%> it, and have <S%H2076>sacrificed<s%> thereunto, and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> be thy <S%H430>gods,<s%> O <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> have brought thee <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> I have <S%H7200>seen<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H7186>stiffnecked<s%> <S%H6203><s%> people: <S%H5971><s%>

Now <S%H6258><s%> therefore let me <S%H5117>alone,<s%> that my <S%H639>wrath<s%> may wax <S%H2734>hot<s%> against them, and that I may <S%H3615>consume<s%> them: and I will <S%H6213>make<s%> of thee a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1471>nation.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H2470>besought<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> his <S%H430>God,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H4100>why<s%> doth thy <S%H639>wrath<s%> wax <S%H2734>hot<s%> against thy <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast brought <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> with <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power,<s%> and with a <S%H2389>mighty<s%> <S%H3027>hand?<s%>

Wherefore <S%H4100><s%> should the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H559>speak,<s%> and <S%H559>say,<s%> For <S%H7451>mischief<s%> did he bring them <S%H3318>out,<s%> to <S%H2026>slay<s%> them in the <S%H2022>mountains,<s%> and to <S%H3615>consume<s%> them <S%H4480>from<s%> <S%H5921><s%> the <S%H6440>face<s%> of the <S%H127>earth?<s%> <S%H7725>Turn<s%> from thy fierce <S%H4480>wrath,<s%> <S%H2740><s%> <S%H639><s%> and <S%H5162>repent<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> this <S%H7451>evil<s%> against thy <S%H5971>people.<s%>

Remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H85>Abraham,<s%> <S%H3327>Isaac,<s%> and <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> thy <S%H5650>servants,<s%> to <S%H834>whom<s%> thou <S%H7650>sworest<s%> by thine own self, and <S%H1696>saidst<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> them, I will <S%H7235>multiply<s%> <S%H853><s%> your <S%H2233>seed<s%> as the <S%H3556>stars<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> I have <S%H559>spoken<s%> of will I <S%H5414>give<s%> unto your <S%H2233>seed,<s%> and they shall <S%H5157>inherit<s%> it <S%H5769>forever.<s%>
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5162>repented<s%> <S%H5921>of<s%> the <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> he <S%H1696>thought<s%> to <S%H6213>do<s%> unto his <S%H5971>people.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6437>turned,<s%> and went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H4480>from<s%> the <S%H2022>mount,<s%> and the <S%H8147>two<s%> <S%H3871>tables<s%> of the <S%H5715>testimony<s%> were in his <S%H3027>hand:<s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> were <S%H3789>written<s%> on <S%H4480>both<s%> <S%H8147><s%> their <S%H5676>sides;<s%> on the one <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H2088><s%> and on the <S%H4480>other<s%> <S%H2088><s%> were <S%H1992>they<s%> <S%H3789>written.<s%>

And the <S%H3871>tables<s%> were the <S%H4639>work<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> and the <S%H4385>writing<s%> was the <S%H4385>writing<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H2801>graven<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> the <S%H3871>tables.<s%>

And when <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> as they <S%H7452>shouted,<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> There is a <S%H6963>noise<s%> of <S%H4421>war<s%> in the <S%H4264>camp.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> It is <S%H369>not<s%> the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that <S%H6030>shout<s%> for <S%H1369>mastery,<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> is it the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of them that <S%H6030>cry<s%> for being <S%H2476>overcome:<s%> but the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of them that <S%H6031>sing<s%> do <S%H595>I<s%> <S%H8085>hear.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> as soon <S%H834>as<s%> he came <S%H7126>nigh<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> that he <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5695>calf,<s%> and the <S%H4246>dancing:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses'<s%> <S%H639>anger<s%> waxed <S%H2734>hot,<s%> and he <S%H7993>cast<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3871>tables<s%> out of his <S%H4480>hands,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H7665>broke<s%> them <S%H8478>beneath<s%> the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And he <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5695>calf<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> they had <S%H6213>made,<s%> and <S%H8313>burnt<s%> it in the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and <S%H2912>ground<s%> it <S%H5704>to<s%> <S%H834>powder,<s%> <S%H1854><s%> and <S%H2219>strewed<s%> it <S%H5921>upon<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H4325>water,<s%> and <S%H853>made<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H8248>drink<s%> of it.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H4100>What<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> unto thee, <S%H3588>that<s%> thou hast <S%H935>brought<s%> so <S%H1419>great<s%> a <S%H2401>sin<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them?

And <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> Let <S%H408>not<s%> the <S%H639>anger<s%> of my <S%H113>lord<s%> wax <S%H2734>hot:<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> <S%H3045>knowest<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H1931>they<s%> are set on <S%H7451>mischief.<s%>

For they <S%H559>said<s%> unto me, <S%H6213>Make<s%> us <S%H430>gods,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> us: <S%H3588>for<s%> as for <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> brought us <S%H5927>up<s%> out of the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> we <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> is <S%H1961>become<s%> of him.

And I <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H4310>Whosoever<s%> hath any <S%H2091>gold,<s%> let them break it <S%H6561>off.<s%> So they <S%H5414>gave<s%> it me: then I <S%H7993>cast<s%> it into the <S%H784>fire,<s%> and there came <S%H3318>out<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5695>calf.<s%>

And when <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H3588>that<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> were <S%H6544>naked;<s%> <S%H3588>(for<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> had made them <S%H6544>naked<s%> unto their <S%H8103>shame<s%> among their enemies: <S%H6965>)<s%>

Then <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> in the <S%H8179>gate<s%> of the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4310>Who<s%> is on the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> side? let him come <S%H413>unto<s%> me. And <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> gathered themselves <S%H622>together<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> him.

And he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>saith<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H7760>Put<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H5921>by<s%> his <S%H3409>side,<s%> and go <S%H5674>in<s%> and <S%H7725>out<s%> from <S%H4480>gate<s%> <S%H8179><s%> to <S%H8179>gate<s%> throughout the <S%H4264>camp,<s%> and <S%H2026>slay<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H251>brother,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7453>companion,<s%> and every <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H853><s%> his <S%H7138>neighbor.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> according to the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> and there <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H4480>of<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H1931>that<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> about <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men.<s%>

For <S%H4872>Moses<s%> had <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4390>Consecrate<s%> <S%H3027><s%> yourselves <S%H3117>today<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> <S%H3588>even<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> upon his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and upon his <S%H251>brother;<s%> that he may <S%H5414>bestow<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> you a <S%H1293>blessing<s%> this <S%H3117>day.<s%>

And it came to <S%H1961>pass<s%> on the <S%H4480>morrow,<s%> <S%H4283><s%> that <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H859>Ye<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin:<s%> and <S%H6258>now<s%> I will go <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> <S%H194>peradventure<s%> I shall make an <S%H3722>atonement<s%> <S%H1157>for<s%> your <S%H2403>sin.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7725>returned<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H577>Oh,<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5971>people<s%> have <S%H2398>sinned<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin,<s%> and have <S%H6213>made<s%> them <S%H430>gods<s%> of <S%H2091>gold.<s%>

Yet <S%H6258>now,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> thou wilt <S%H5375>forgive<s%> their <S%H2403>sin;<s%> and <S%H518>if<s%> <S%H369>not,<s%> <S%H4229>blot<s%> me, I pray <S%H4994>thee,<s%> out of thy <S%H4480>book<s%> <S%H5612><s%> <S%H834>which<s%> thou hast <S%H3789>written.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H4310>Whosoever<s%> <S%H834><s%> hath <S%H2398>sinned<s%> against me, him will I blot <S%H4229>out<s%> of my <S%H4480>book.<s%> <S%H5612><s%>

Therefore <S%H6258>now<s%> <S%H1980>go,<s%> <S%H5148>lead<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the place of <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H1696>spoken<s%> unto thee: <S%H2009>behold,<s%> mine <S%H4397>Angel<s%> shall <S%H1980>go<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> thee: nevertheless in the <S%H3117>day<s%> when I <S%H6485>visit<s%> I will <S%H6485>visit<s%> their <S%H2403>sin<s%> <S%H5921>upon<s%> them.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H5062>plagued<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> they <S%H6213>made<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H5695>calf,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6213>made.<s%>
